com.github.moribund.graphics.animations

Class SpriteAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion>
      • com.github.moribund.graphics.animations.SpriteAnimation

  • public class SpriteAnimation
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion>
    A custom class for an Animation that keeps track of if the animation is currently playing and allows for post-runnable actions when an animation finished.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation

        com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation.PlayMode

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean playing
      If the SpriteAnimation is playing.
      private float stateTime
      The current time running for the animation.
      private java.lang.Runnable whenEnded
      The post-runnable action to invoke once the animation has been complete.

      Creates a SpriteAnimation given a particular duration and the frames.

      • SpriteAnimation

        SpriteAnimation(float frameDuration,
                com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<? extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> keyFrames)
        Creates a SpriteAnimation given a particular duration and the frames.
        Parameters:
        frameDuration - The value between 0 and 1 for the duration of the animation.
        keyFrames - The frames based on the animation.

    • Method Detail

      • drawAnimation

                          com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite originalSprite)
        Draws a particular animation.
        Parameters:
        batch - The batch to draw the Animation.keyFrames to.
        originalSprite - The original sprite to mock the location and rotation of.
